title: Dua Allahumma Adkhil
description: A invocation seeking divine assistance for the living and the deceased, recited after every obligatory prayer in Ramadan

preamble.arabic:
وى الكفعمي في المصباح والبلد الأمين عن النبيّ صلى الله عليه و آله أنّه قال: « 
مَنْ دَعا بهذا الدُّعاءِ فِي رَمَضانَ بَعْدَ كُلِّ فَرِيضَةٍ غَفَرَ اللَّهُ لَهُ ذُنوبَهُ
preamble.english: Al-Kaf‘amī has narrated in *al-Miṣbāḥ* and *al-Balad al-Amīn*, on the authority of the Prophet, may Allah bless him and his family, that he said: “Whoever supplicates with this supplication during Ramadan after every obligatory prayer, Allah will forgive his sins.”

phrases.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ ادْخِلْ عَلى اهْلِ الْقُبُورِ السُّرُورَ،
phrases.english: O Allah, bring joy to the inhabitants of the graves.
O Allah, enrich every poor person.
O Allah, satisfy every hungry one.
O Allah, clothe every naked person.
O Allah, settle the debt of every debtor.
O Allah, grant relief to every person in distress.

phrases.arabic: اللهُمَّ اصْلِحْ كُلَّ فاسِدٍ مِنْ امُورِ الْمُسْلِمينَ،
phrases.english: O Allah, rectify all that is corrupt in the affairs of the Muslims.
phrases.transliteration: Allāhumma aṣliḥ kulla fāsidin min umūri al-muslimīn

phrases.english: O Allah, heal every sick person.
O Allah, mend our poverty with Your wealth.

phrases.arabic: اللهُمَّ غَيِّرْ سُوءَ حالِنا بِحُسْنِ حالِكَ،
phrases.english: O Allah, change the wretchedness of our state through the excellence of Your state.
phrases.transliteration: Allāhumma ghayyir sūʾa ḥālinā bi-ḥusni ḥālika

phrases.arabic: انَّكَ عَلى كُلِّ شَىْ ءٍ قَديرٌ [
phrases.english: Verily, You have power over all things.
